alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Humboldt; Pocahontas; Sac; Webster (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 6:21AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Webster, Pocahontas, eastern Sac, Calhoun and Humboldt Counties through 700 AM CDT... At 621 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles west of South Twin Lake, or 9 miles east of Sac City, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail and additional rainfall up to one inch. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Ponding of ponding of water on roadways, low visibilities, and rises in small streams and creeks. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Rockwell City, South Twin Lake and North Twin Lake around 630 AM CDT. Manson around 635 AM CDT. Dakota City and Humboldt around 700 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Woodman Hollow State Park, Lytton, Twin Lakes State Park, Knierim, Rockwell City Municipal Airport, Clare, Ottosen, Pomeroy, Lehigh and Blackhawk Lake State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
